# Screen Setting

## Large Indicators Mode (EVF)

Select **ON** to display large indicators in the electronic viewfinder. The indicators displayed can be selected using:

**SCREEN SET-UP > LARGE INDICATORS DISP. SETTING.**

!EVF Indicators

*OFF* | *ON*

- Some icons are not displayed when **ON** is selected for **LARGE INDICATORS MODE (EVF)** (ðŸ“– 13).
- If **LARGE INDICATORS MODE** is assigned to a function button, the button can be used to toggle **LARGE INDICATORS MODE** on (**ON**) and off (**OFF**) (ðŸ“– 321).

## Large Indicators Mode (LCD)

Select **ON** to display large indicators in the LCD monitor. The indicators displayed can be selected using:

**SCREEN SET-UP > LARGE INDICATORS DISP. SETTING.**

!LCD Indicators

*OFF* | *ON*

- Some icons are not displayed when **ON** is selected for **LARGE INDICATORS MODE (LCD)** (ðŸ“– 15).
- If **LARGE INDICATORS MODE** is assigned to a function button, the button can be used to toggle **LARGE INDICATORS MODE** on (**ON**) and off (**OFF**) (ðŸ“– 321).
